snippet: Stacy Lewis moved into position to take the top spot in the world, shooting an eight-under-par 63 at the ShopRite L.P.G.A. Classic in Galloway Township, N.J.
abstract: Stacy Lewis moves into position to take the top spot in the world, shooting an eight-under-par 63 at the ShopRite LPGA Classic; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stacy Lewis moved into position to take the top spot in the world, shooting an eight-under-par 63 at the ShopRite L.P.G.A. Classic in Galloway Township, N.J.

headline.main: Lewis Edges Toward Top L.P.G.A. Ranking
headline.print_headline: Lewis Closing in on No. 1 Ranking
